name: Titanic - The Unsinkable Ship
description:
Not important talk from the developer which you can skip :

(Originally this game was made for mobile platforms but I ran into some complications and the game was taken down from google play. Since I put a lot of work and time into this game I didn't want to just let this game sit in my computer. I made this game alone with a help of my brother who made 3D assets. It is a little shorter but fun none the less :) The game is for free but if you enjoyed it I would be very thankful for any donation because I am currently working on another bigger game and it would be nice to have some budget :D But just the fact that you would play it makes me happy.  I hope that you will enjoy it :) )

Titanic - The Unsinkable Ship is a first-person game, that lets you choose between two unique characters and experience, what it feels like to be on a sinking ship. Help others and yourself to get to safety and survive.

*9.1.2022 - UPDATE - Water bug fixed in Version 1.1.

TarnepGames.
